attributes.action: Review the usage of motorway signs so they are only used in extreme circumstances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When driving on Britain’s motorway network the overhead signs often say "Incident Ahead" "40" so everyone slows down to 40 causing congestion and the possibility of an accident, although in my experience there is rarely any incident. Thus all the sign has done is cause congestion and infuriate motorists. The same applies to Queue ahead and various other motorway signs.

The signs should be used but only in the correct circumstances and not all the time as they appear to be used at the moment.
